00040 CvPoint2D32f SkinModel::GetSkinAreaCenter(IplImage* frame, IplImage* mask, double& nMatches) {
00041         CvPoint2D32f center = cvPoint2D32f(0,0);
00042         float norm = 0;
00043         for (int y=0; y<frame->height; y++)
00044         for (int x=0; x<frame->width; x++)
00045         {
00046                 if (mask->imageData[y*mask->widthStep+x] != 0) {
00047                         CvScalar pix = cvGet2D(frame, y, x);
00048                         int value = GetValue(pix);
00049                         if (value > 0) {
00050                                 center.x += value*x;
00051                                 center.y += value*y;
00052                                 norm += value;
00053                         }
00054                 }
00055         }
00056         nMatches = norm;
00057         if (norm == 0)
00058                 return cvPoint2D32f(-1, -1);
00059 
00060         center.x /= norm;
00061         center.y /= norm;
00062         return center;
00063 }

00073 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00074 void SkinModel::DrawSkinAreas(IplImage* output, IplImage* frame) {
00075         cvCvtColor(frame, lab, CV_BGR2Lab);
00076         float min_value = 0, max_value = 0;
00077         cvGetMinMaxHistValue( color.h, &min_value, &max_value, 0, 0 );
00078         for (int y=0; y<lab->height; y++)
00079         for (int x=0; x<lab->width; x++)
00080         {
00081                 CvScalar pix = cvGet2D(lab, y, x);
00082                 double a = pix.val[1];
00083                 double b = pix.val[2];
00084                 int value = GetValue(a, b);
00085                 Pixel p(round((value-min_value)*255/(max_value-min_value)), 0, 0);
00086                 Image::setPixel(output, &p, x, y);
00087         }
00088 }
